channel.title: Forty-Two on Tim Rekelj
channel.description: Recent content in Forty-Two on Tim Rekelj

item.title: me
item.description: Hello! I’m Tim Rekelj, currently in my third year studying Computer Science at the University of Ljubljana, Faculty of Computer and Information Science. I’m passionate about technology’s ability to solve complex challenges and improve our lives. Over the course of my studies, Iâ€™ve developed a strong foundation in various programming languages and technologies, including Python, Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, C, Odin, Vue, Docker etc. while also deepening my understanding of computer systems, algorithms, and data structures.
